meta.title: You.v2 - 17-Day Subconscious Reprogramming Protocol
meta.description: You.v2 is a 17-day subconscious reprogramming protocol for high-performing individuals who feel inexplicably blocked by old patterns.

hero.title: You lead, guide, and support others ‚Äî but you know it's time to focus on yourself.
hero.subtitle: A structured and personalized hypnotherapy approach to end self-sabotage by working directly with your subconscious ‚Äî where real change begins.
hero.description1: Your subconscious mind holds the patterns that keep you stuck ‚Äî and the power to change everything.
hero.description2: You don't need more willpower. You need access to the part of your mind where real change begins.
hero.description3: You've done the mindset work. You've tried therapy. But something deeper still holds you back.
hero.description4: It's time to work with your subconscious mind ‚Äî where lasting change begins.
hero.ctaMicrocopy: No obligation. 100% confidential. Best for those who've already tried the traditional approaches.

howItWorks.title: This isn't therapy. It's reprogramming.
howItWorks.description1: Your subconscious is your internal operating system ‚Äî and it was installed before you had a say. It runs your emotions, your impulses, your loyalties.
howItWorks.description2: Logic doesn't reach it. Coaching can't override it. Motivation bounces off it. That's why most change fails ‚Äî or exhausts you.
howItWorks.callout: Between your conscious and your subconscious is a firewall: the critical factor. It protects old identity code. Until we bypass it, you'll stay loyal to beliefs you no longer need.
howItWorks.description3: Most traditional approaches work on the levels of environment, behavior, and knowledge. But real change should happen at the level where the problem originated. With my help, you will use deep system-level interventions to rewrite that code ‚Äî precisely, calmly, permanently.
howItWorks.tagline: We don't fix symptoms. We reprogram the system.
howItWorks.quote: "You've worked hard at the behavior level. It's time to reset where it actually matters."

theWhy.title: The Why
theWhy.promise: Through this work, I'll teach you how to access and use the power of your own subconscious mind ‚Äî so that you can stop self-sabotaging, achieve your goals more easily, and continue creating meaningful change long after our work is done.
theWhy.vision: My work is about more than personal change. It's about breaking generational patterns, removing invisible blocks, and making sure that the pain you carry doesn't get passed down to your children. I do this because I like to create more happy people around me by liberating them from their subconscious limiting beliefs and patterns that no longer serve them.

isThisForYou.title: Is This For You?
bullets: You feel stuck despite external success
You're ready to do deep work with lasting impact
You help others every day, but have no one to help you
isThisForYou.description1: This work is especially effective for people in helping roles ‚Äî coaches, therapists, doctors, lawyers, business leaders ‚Äî because you understand change, and you're ready to do the work that goes beyond what most methods can reach.
isThisForYou.description2: This work is for people who are truly ready. Not to talk, cope, or hope ‚Äî but to actually change.

whatMakesDifferent.quote: Other methods help you cope. I help you rewrite the code.

issues.title: Issues We Can Address
issues.intro: I work with professionals who have achieved a lot ‚Äî yet still feel that something isn't right beneath the surface. Here are just a few areas where subconscious reprogramming can create powerful change:

items.title: External success ‚Äî but love feels impossible
items.desc: You've built a career, solved big problems, earned respect. But in relationships, you keep hitting the same walls: distance, pain, self-doubt. It's not bad luck ‚Äî it reflects a root issue.

items.title: Money comes ‚Äî and then disappears
items.desc: You earn well, but you can't grow further. Fear of big numbers, guilt around success, inner conflict between safety and freedom ‚Äî this isn't about the market. It's about your internal structure.

items.title: You ‚Äî or someone close ‚Äî suddenly changed
items.desc: After an illness, surgery, accident, or even intense stress, something feels off. Like part of you is missing. This work helps with what logic can't explain.

items.title: You don't want to become your parents ‚Äî but you're already repeating them
items.desc: Guilt, frustration, emotional distance with your child ‚Äî these often echo patterns you lived through yourself. We can stop inherited pain from passing forward.

items.title: Irrational moods, fears, or desires
items.desc: Anxiety, irritability, mood swings, irrational fears and urges ‚Äî these aren‚Äôt flaws in your personality. They‚Äôre often signs your subconscious is working overtime to manage something unresolved.

items.title: Unexplained physical symptoms or habits
items.desc: Compulsive behaviors, physical tension, headaches, and unexplained symptoms often start as the subconscious trying to protect you. They need to be decoded and processed ‚Äî not ignored.

issues.outro: Every person is different. If you don't see your situation here ‚Äî reach out. I don't treat diagnoses or give labels. Every story can be rewritten.

timeline.title: You.v2 Protocol ‚Äî 17 Days to Reclaim Yourself

steps.desc: Define the internal architecture. Identify core old logic.
Light trance imagery to map your mental landscape
Identify and address core limiting beliefs
Work with supporting patterns and structures
Solidify changes and create ongoing access

roi.supporting: Everything else is maintenance. You.v2 is a solution.

credentials: Former psychiatrist with postdoctoral training at Yale and UCSD
Subconscious strategist for high-performing clients who need deep, fast change
about.quote: "I don't hold space. I change internal architecture. Quietly. Precisely. Permanently."

globalHighPerformers.title: Why It Works for Global High Performers
globalHighPerformers.subtitle: For global citizens who live between worlds and languages
points: I work in English, Russian, or any mix of both‚Äîwhatever feels natural.
I know what it's like to be raised under pressure to succeed and hide your feelings.
I have overcome the legacy of a difficult childhood‚Äîand I can help you do the same.
globalHighPerformers.quote: You are successful in English, but your inner child still needs help in your first language.
globalHighPerformers.prelude: You work and think in English. But your subconscious mind was programmed in your first language. Therapy or coaching in English misses your roots. Therapy in your first language misses your real life now.
globalHighPerformers.preludeHighlight: You need someone who understands both the challenges you face in a Western world‚Äîand the way your subconscious mind was programmed by your native culture.
globalHighPerformers.ctaPrompt: Ready to take the first step?

clientStory.femalePerspective: "I held everyone else together, balancing leadership and personal well-being felt impossible until I found a space to truly reset." ‚Äî Anonymous You V2 Client

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. It's faster, deeper, and structurally targeted.

items.question: Is this remote?
items.answer: Yes. All sessions are online and timezone-flexible.

items.question: Do I need to believe in anything for it to work?
items.answer: No. The process works whether or not you believe in it. You just need to show up.

items.question: What if I've already done a lot of therapy?
items.answer: Perfect. That means you've cleared the surface. This goes deeper.

items.question: How soon will I notice changes?
items.answer: Most clients report noticeable shifts after the first or second session. The full protocol ensures these changes are structural and lasting.
